Gangon figured that BrightBlade must have been busy. "You can catch up, I h=
ave to run!" Gangon said. He ran to the mountain as fast as he could. He lo=
oked up the mountain. He hated heights! He started to climb the mountain, w=
hining about never getting any help...

Plintissa and Suukie were going smo=
oth together, until Plintissa asked him a question he couldn't answer. "Has=
 anyone ever loved you before?" She asked. Suukie knew no girl would like h=
im, he was awful, but now Plintissa liked him, so he didn't know what to th=
ink. He didn't answer. Plintissa knew what it was like so she let it drop.
=

Dracona led the Radicons to the mountain. "Who's the best climber?" Arrow =
asked. All of the radicons were silent. Then all of them looked at Airbombe=
r. Airbomber gulped. "Airbomber does high risk stuff all the time! Let him =
go!" Train Wreck said. "Stop it, we will all climb the mountain, 7 is bette=
r than 1!" Dracona said, breaking the fight that was undoubtebly going to b=
egin. "You must have meant 9 is better than 1." Sinesis said, he and Sinist=
er walking up. Dracona nodded and the 9 of them started to climb the mounta=
in, Dracona and Sinesis climbing instead of flying in order to save energy.=
..
